submission:
class Solution:
    def minChanges(self, nums: List[int], k: int) -> int:
        cnt = Counter([abs(nums[i] - nums[~i]) for i in range(len(nums) // 2)])
        diff = []
        for i in range(len(nums) // 2):
            large = max(nums[i], nums[~i])
            small = min(nums[i], nums[~i])
            gap1 = large - 0
            gap2 = k - small
            diff.append(max(gap1, gap2))
        # print(diff)
        diff.sort()
        # print(diff)
        ans = len(nums)
        for k, c in cnt.items():
            p = bisect_left(diff, k)
            to_changes = len(nums) // 2 - c
            changes = to_changes + p
            ans = min(ans, changes)
            
        return ans
